field.check: loai_thay_doi not in (select ma_loai from hrdmltdbh)

processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @stateSalary varchar(32) declare @user int, @admin bit, @sys varchar(32), @joinUnit bit, @joinDept bit, @r int, @count int
select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName', @key = '', @joinUnit = 0, @joinDept = 0 select @stateSalary = rtrim(val) from options where ma_phan_he = 'HR' and name = 'm_si_loai_nn'
-- Checking &Checking;
select @field = 'ngay_thay_doi' if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, stt, '00002' from @@table where ngay_thay_doi2 is not null and ngay_thay_doi2 < ngay_thay_doi &w1;@field&w2;stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table where ngay_thay_doi2 is not null and ngay_thay_doi2 < ngay_thay_doi&Error; end
if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, '00002' from @@table a join @@table b on a.ma_nv = b.ma_nv and a.stt <> b.stt where ((a.ngay_thay_doi = b.ngay_thay_doi) or (b.ngay_thay_doi <= a.ngay_thay_doi2 and b.ngay_thay_doi2 >= a.ngay_thay_doi) or (b.ngay_thay_doi2 is null and b.ngay_thay_doi between a.ngay_thay_doi and a.ngay_thay_doi2) or (a.ngay_thay_doi2 is null and a.ngay_thay_doi between b.ngay_thay_doi and b.ngay_thay_doi2)) &w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a join @@table b on a.ma_nv = b.ma_nv and a.stt <> b.stt where ((a.ngay_thay_doi = b.ngay_thay_doi) or (b.ngay_thay_doi <= a.ngay_thay_doi2 and b.ngay_thay_doi2 >= a.ngay_thay_doi) or (b.ngay_thay_doi2 is null and b.ngay_thay_doi between a.ngay_thay_doi and a.ngay_thay_doi2) or (a.ngay_thay_doi2 is null and a.ngay_thay_doi between b.ngay_thay_doi and b.ngay_thay_doi2))&Error; end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, '00002' from @@table a join hrnv c on a.ma_nv = c.ma_nv join hreqtlbhht b on c.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_thay_doi <> b.ngay_thay_doi where ((b.ngay_thay_doi <= a.ngay_thay_doi2 and b.ngay_thay_doi2 >= a.ngay_thay_doi) or (b.ngay_thay_doi2 is null and b.ngay_thay_doi between a.ngay_thay_doi and a.ngay_thay_doi2) or (a.ngay_thay_doi2 is null and a.ngay_thay_doi between b.ngay_thay_doi and b.ngay_thay_doi2)) &w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a join hrnv c on a.ma_nv = c.ma_nv join hreqtlbhht b on c.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_thay_doi <> b.ngay_thay_doi where ((b.ngay_thay_doi <= a.ngay_thay_doi2 and b.ngay_thay_doi2 >= a.ngay_thay_doi) or (b.ngay_thay_doi2 is null and b.ngay_thay_doi between a.ngay_thay_doi and a.ngay_thay_doi2) or (a.ngay_thay_doi2 is null and a.ngay_thay_doi between b.ngay_thay_doi and b.ngay_thay_doi2))&Error; end
if @stateSalary = '2' begin select top 0 stt, cast('' as varchar(32)) as ma_nv, cast(null as smalldatetime) as ngay_thay_doi, ngay_hl, luong_tt into #baseSalary from hrdmlttc insert into #baseSalary select max(a.stt), a.ma_nv, a.ngay_thay_doi, max(b.ngay_hl), max(a.luong_toi_thieu) from @@table a join hrdmlttc b on b.ngay_hl <= a.ngay_thay_doi group by a.ma_nv, a.ngay_thay_doi select @field = 'luong_toi_thieu' if exists(select top 1 1 from #baseSalary) begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, '00002' from @@table a left join #baseSalary b on a.ma_nv = b.ma_nv and a.ngay_thay_doi = b.ngay_thay_doi join hrdmlttc c on b.ngay_hl = c.ngay_hl where b.luong_tt <> c.luong_tt &w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(a.stt) from #baseSalary a join hrdmlttc b on a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl where a.luong_tt <> b.luong_tt&Error; end end else begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, stt, '00002' from @@table where luong_toi_thieu <> 0&w1;@field&w2;stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table where luong_toi_thieu <> 0&Error; end end end &EndErrorMode;
-- Key if @admin = 0 begin exec AI_ERP$HRM$DeptRightFilter @user, @admin, 'e', 'e', @sys, @key output, @joinUnit output, @joinDept output
if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'hrEmployeeSIHistory', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = 0 end
select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key) select @key = case when @key = '' then '' else ' where (' + @key + ')' end end
-- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, ngay_thay_doi, ngay_thay_doi2, loai_thay_doi, cap_bac, chuc_danh, don_vi, dia_chi, hs_luong, hs_pc_chuc_vu, hs_pc_vuot_khung, hs_pc_khu_vuc, hs_pc_tham_nien, t_he_so, luong_toi_thieu, luong_co_ban, ty_le_bhxh, tien_bhxh, ty_le_bhyt, tien_bhyt, ty_le_bhtn, tien_bhtn, ty_le_kpcd, tien_kpcd, can_cu, cast(0 as int) as stt into #r from hreqtlbhht
select @q = 'insert into #r select e.stt_rec, '''', a.ngay_thay_doi, a.ngay_thay_doi2, a.loai_thay_doi, a.cap_bac, a.chuc_danh, a.don_vi, a.dia_chi,' select @q = @q + 'a.hs_luong, a.hs_pc_chuc_vu, a.hs_pc_vuot_khung, a.hs_pc_khu_vuc, a.hs_pc_tham_nien, a.t_he_so, a.luong_toi_thieu, a.luong_co_ban,' select @q = @q + 'a.ty_le_bhxh, a.tien_bhxh, a.ty_le_bhyt, a.tien_bhyt, a.ty_le_bhtn, a.tien_bhtn, 0, 0, a.can_cu, 0' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a join hrnv e on a.ma_nv = e.ma_nv' + @key exec sp_executesql @q
-- Delete if @type = '0' delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from hreqtlbhht b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_thay_doi = b.ngay_thay_doi) select b.stt_rec, b.stt_rec0, a.ngay_thay_doi, a.ngay_thay_doi2, a.loai_thay_doi, a.cap_bac, a.chuc_danh, a.don_vi, a.dia_chi, a.hs_luong, a.hs_pc_chuc_vu, a.hs_pc_vuot_khung, a.hs_pc_khu_vuc, a.hs_pc_tham_nien, a.t_he_so, a.luong_toi_thieu, a.luong_co_ban, a.ty_le_bhxh, a.tien_bhxh, a.ty_le_bhyt, a.tien_bhyt, a.ty_le_bhtn, a.tien_bhtn, a.ty_le_kpcd, a.tien_kpcd, a.can_cu into #k from #r a join hreqtlbhht b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_thay_doi = b.ngay_thay_doi delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_thay_doi = b.ngay_thay_doi)
-- Insert select @count = count(*) from #r if @count > 0 begin create table #stt(stt_rec char(13), stt_rec0 char(3)) create table #o1(stt_rec char(13), ngay_thay_doi smalldatetime, stt int not null identity (1, 1))
insert into #stt select b.stt_rec, max(b.stt_rec0) from #r a join hreqtlbhht b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec group by b.stt_rec
insert into #o1(stt_rec, ngay_thay_doi) select stt_rec, ngay_thay_doi from (select stt_rec, ngay_thay_doi as ngay_thay_doi from #r union select distinct stt_rec, null from #r) a order by stt_rec, ngay_thay_doi
select stt, stt_rec into #o2 from #o1 where ngay_thay_doi is null update #r set stt = b.stt + cast(isnull(dbo.ff_Seq2Dec(c.stt_rec0), 0) as int) from #r a left join (select c.stt - d.stt as stt, c.stt_rec, c.ngay_thay_doi from #o1 c join #o2 d on c.stt_rec = d.stt_rec) b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_thay_doi = b.ngay_thay_doi left join #stt c on a.stt_rec = c.stt_rec
-- Insert &Inserting; end -- Update if @type = '1' begin &ListWhenBeforeImportUpdateLog; &ListWhenBeforeImportUpdateLogEmployeeSetDateEdit; update hreqtlbhht set @@list from hreqtlbhht a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.stt_rec0 = b.stt_rec0 end
